REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0062 reute h f BC-FORD-<F>-SELECTS-FIRM 03-11 0058

TEXT.TITLE: FORD <F> SELECTS FIRM TO AUTOMATE PLANT
TEXT.BODY: Ford Motor Co selected <Scicon Corp's> Systems Control unit to install a manufacturing automation system at Ford's Hermosillo, Mexico, plant, Scicon said. The system, the value of which was not disclosed, will provide Ford with automated vehicle tracking capabilities, Scicon said. Reuter
